description.narrative: The new Irish Aid Programme Funding proposal is for the period between 2017-2021. The programme will have the same 6 focus areas that were previously funded: Angola, Central America (Guatemala and El Salvador), Colombia, Sierra Leone, IOPT, Zimbabwe.

mailing-address.narrative: Christian Aid, 35-41 Lower Marsh, London SE1 7RL, United Kingdom
